Survey_Page.Title: Peer-Reviewed Publications

Closed_Question.Name: peer_rev_pubs
Closed_Question.Stem: Did the resources provided by UCLA CTSI result in any peer-reviewed publications?

Survey_Page.Directive:
peer_rev_pubs
1
Please enter a title below for each peer-reviewed publication that resulted from UCLA CTSI resources, and answer associated questions.

Repeating_Item_Set.Title: Peer-Reviewed Publications
Repeating_Item_Set.Directive: Please provide the following information on any publication(s) that resulted from UCLA CTSI resources.

Open_Question.Name: barriers_moving_research
Open_Question.Stem: Please describe barriers or challenges you encountered in moving your research forward after receiving UCLA CTSI support.

Open_Question.Name: facilitating_factors
Open_Question.Stem: Please describe facilitating factors that enabled advances in your research after receiving UCLA CTSI support.

Invitee_Fields.p: This is the test survey shared link. Because you are starting this survey from a shared link, we need to ask for some basic information about you. Please fill out the information requested below. Your email address is not required but providing it will enable you to resume if you get interrupted. Your email is also required for you to be entered into the drawing for an iPad.

salutation.label: Select the saluation to use in email messages to you:
